thread.title: Another hot February day, another temperature record broken
thread.title_full: Another hot February day, another temperature record broken

author: Danika Worthington
title: Another hot February day, another temperature record broken
text: February 16, 2017, 3:27 pm Forecasters say Denverites can expect another record-breaking day with temperatures soaring to around 74 degrees on Thursday. February 15, 2017, 11:23 am Forecast calls for beautiful Colorado weather through Saturday with the possibility of a record high on Thursday. Weather Service suffers “catastrophic” outage, stops sending forecasts, warnings February 13, 2017, 5:43 pm On a day when a blizzard is pasting Maine and Northern California faces a dire flooding threat, several of the National Weather Service’s primary systems for sending out alerts to the public have failed. Cloudy in Denver metro area, light snow in the mountains February 13, 2017, 7:17 am It will be mostly cloudy on Monday with a high near 49 degrees, according to the National Weather Service in Boulder.
